definition: the West/abbr. for Spain 西班牙[Xi1 ban1 ya2]/Spanish

gate/door/CL:扇[shan4]/gateway/doorway/CL:個|个[ge4]/opening/valve/switch/way to do something/knack/family/house/(religious) sect/school (of thought)/class/category/phylum or division (taxonomy)/classifier for large guns/classifier for lessons, subjects, branches of technology/(suffix) -gate (i.e. scandal; derived from Watergate)
Ximen Qing, character from 金瓶梅[Jin1 ping2 mei2] and 水滸傳|水浒传[Shui3 hu3 Zhuan4]
Xi Menbao (active around 422 BC), statesman, general and hydraulic engineer of Wei state 魏國|魏国[Wei4 guo2]

sentences.english: Its authors had detailed knowledge of Siemens’ software and its security weaknesses.
sentences.chinese: 筆者已經詳細的瞭解了西門子軟件的安全漏洞在哪裏。

sentences.english: In Taipei's movie district, the action flicks are always the biggest draws.
sentences.chinese: 臺北西門町的電影街中，動作片的觀衆總是最多。

sentences.english: Saint -Simon's basic argument is of the necessary relation between property and power.
sentences.chinese: 聖西門的基本出發點是財產與權力的必然聯繫。

sentences.english: And likewise also James and John, the sons of Zebedee , who were partners with Simon.
sentences.chinese: 西門的夥伴，西庇太的兒子雅各和約翰也是這樣。

sentences.english: 30Simon's mother-in-law was in bed with a fever, and they told Jesus about her.
sentences.chinese: 西門的岳母正害着熱病躺着，就有人告訴耶穌。

sentences.english: Mr. Simms, I'll give you one final opportunity to speak up.
sentences.chinese: 西門斯先生我給你最後一次機會申辯。

sentences.english: Like that because of a piece of receipt for a loan, forcibly the marriage she and Xi Menqing is terminative.
sentences.chinese: 然又因一張借條，強行將她與西門清的婚姻終結。

sentences.english: Siemens electrical appliances, specialized in optical glass.
sentences.chinese: 西門子電器，專業無花光學玻璃。

sentences.english: Power engineering quickly became a second pillar of Siemens'worldwide business.
sentences.chinese: 電力工程很快成爲西門子全球業務的第二大支柱業務。

sentences.english: Please pay attention to our website for more information.
sentences.chinese: 更多徵文活動信息，請留意西門子網站。

sentences.english: And it came to pass, that he tarried many days in Joppa with one Simon a tanner.
sentences.chinese: 此後彼得在約帕一個硝皮匠西門的家裏，住了多日。

sentences.english: A Shiguang Road bound Shanghai Metro Line 8 train departs from Laoximen Station.
sentences.chinese: 往市光路的上海地鐵8號線的列車開出老西門站。

sentences.english: Do you know anything the new Siemen system?
sentences.chinese: 你知道新的西門子系統？

sentences.english: We will meet at the west gate of the university at 9am, Sunday; a bus has been arranged.
sentences.chinese: 我們將在週日上午9點在學校西門集合等車。

sentences.english: In the era of Warring States, Ximen Bao was appointed as the county magistrate of Yecheng.
sentences.chinese: 戰國時期，西門豹被派到鄴城當縣官。
